alert.note: Alert for Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Watch issued January 04 at 5:57AM PST until further notice by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Watch is extended for the following rivers in Oregon... Pudding River at Aurora affecting Greater Portland Metro Area and Central Willamette Valley zones. S Yamhill River at McMinnville affecting Central Willamette Valley zone. ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Flooding is possible. * WHERE...Pudding River at Aurora. * WHEN...From this evening until further notice. * IMPACTS...Above 22.0 feet, expect minor flooding of low-lying agricultural lands and access roads along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 4:00 AM PST Tuesday the stage was 17.8 feet. - Forecast...Flood stage may be reached late this evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: If you are in the watch area, remain alert to possible flooding. Residents and those with interests near the river should monitor rising water levels and be prepared for possible flood warnings. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 400 PM PST.

area.areaDesc: Central Willamette Valley; Greater Portland Metro Area
